This Shiny application is part of the Developing Data Products Coursera course project https://www.coursera.org/learn/data-products/.

It was used a dataset provided by the Brazilian government on the internet service offered by different companies.
(Available at: http://dados.gov.br/dataset/resultado-consolidado-da-pesquisa-banda-larga-fixa)
Statistics extracted from this dataset are displayed graphically through this shiny app.

The code is available at https://github.com/mmondelli/datascience-coursera.

An R presentation with additional information is available at https://github.com/mmondelli/datascience-coursera.

October 12, 2017.
